definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Ore Collectors have secondary abilities that are very effective against Terror Drones.
sentences.chinese: 矿车的第二能力对抗恐怖机器人都是非常有效的。

sentences.english: Next we took a mine cart ride, a la Temple of Doom.
sentences.chinese: 我们玩得下一个游戏是死亡之庙的矿车之旅。

sentences.english: At this time, a motor vehicle pulled carts passing from the side.
sentences.chinese: 这时，一辆电机车拉着矿车从身边驶过。

sentences.english: Follow this up from the War Factory with two Scorpions, then two Harvesters.
sentences.chinese: 跟着从车工厂造两个蝎子之后是两个矿车。

sentences.english: It takes 5 upgraded Vindicators to destroy one Ore Collector.
sentences.chinese: 需要5架升级的维护者才可以干掉一辆矿车。

sentences.english: The device of the invention is arranged on a tramcar and carries out dust abatement following a running locomotive.
sentences.chinese: 本发明装置安装在矿车上，跟随运行的机车进行除尘。

sentences.english: If the tramcar runs over speed, then an alarm is given.
sentences.chinese: 若矿车超速，则有报警信号发出。

sentences.english: The train comes to a halt half an hour later.
sentences.chinese: 小矿车在稍停一个半小时后返回。

sentences.english: You can also use the Stormriders to harass harvesters and buildings like Power Plants.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用风暴骑士来骚扰矿车或建筑，比如电厂。

sentences.english: It accords with the fact of tramcars' running to use the method of frequency measurement.
sentences.chinese: 应用测频率法，符合矿车运行实际情况。

sentences.english: The most common use for the lightning spike is harvester harrassment .
sentences.chinese: 闪电柱最常用的地方是矿车骚扰。

definition: caterpillar track (propulsion system used on bulldozers etc)/(literary) shoes and belt
